short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a context menu to copy the clicked link's text

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Without this extension, copying a link's text is sometimes a bit of an art form. You have to highlight the link to copy the text, which usually involves copying the text around it. 

This extension allows you to simply right-click on the link and copy the link text. It even supports links in Jira.
